item.description:
I originally posted this as a tweetstorm, but I‚Äôm treating this as the canonical and adding a tweet to the end of that ‚Äútopic‚Äù linking back here. Indie web forever.

  • My online writing needs are weird. I have searched for years, and unfortunately‚Ä¶ I need to write a custom CMS.

  • I thought briefly about hammering together what I need with Metalsmith.io and its plugins. But that would be a stopgap.

  • So the inevitable comes to pass: I commit to, however slowly, build the CMS I need.

    Probably in Rust‚Äîso it should be crazy fast.

  • If you want to follow along on this site generator/CMS adventure (it‚Äôll move slowly), you can do so here.1

  • First pass: just going to shell out on the command line. Second pass‚Ä¶ well, if speed is what I‚Äôm going for‚Ä¶

  • I‚Äôve guessed this for a while, but I can confirm it now: Clap is a really fantastic command-line argument library.
